name: Bunge Jungle
description: Bored of all the games you played? Are you tired of tapping with your fingers? Then stop playing these orthodox games. Bunge Jungle is here for you to keep you off from the stress of tapping because the only job for you is to tilt your device! Crazy game mechanics are here for you to try! You are jumping! Not by tapping with your fingers! The only task for you is to tilt your device the way you want to jump. Avoid the barricades because if you jump on them, itâ€™s game over for you, sadly! Jump along, and gain some points!  So what are you waiting for now? Let yourself loose because the time has come for you to download the best jumping game there is now on the market!
